name: py-terminado
description: Terminals served to term.js using Tornado websockets

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-flit
dependencies.description: Flit is a simple way to put Python packages and modules on PyPI.

dependencies.name: py-tornado
dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependencies.name: py-ptyprocess
dependencies.description: Run a subprocess in a pseudo terminal

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server
dependent_to.description:
The Jupyter Server provides the backend (i.e. the core services, APIs,
and REST endpoints) for Jupyter web applications like Jupyter notebook,
JupyterLab, and Voila.
